Sons of the Sea
Shotton, Flintshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5. Best cornet - Shotton. Best trombone - Connahs Quay. Best euphonium - Altrincham. March contest - 1st Altrincham, 2nd Shotton. 5 bands competed.
